author: Wuzzy

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
This is a texture pack for Minetest Game that is based on the textures from the earliest versions of Minetest-c55 (the original name of Luanti).

On top, I created my own textures that roughly follow the same style for things that did not exist back then.

**Coverage**: This texture pack guarantees full coverage for Minetest Game versions 5.4.0 to 5.9.0. Other versions may have full or high coverage as well.
name: retroplus
short_description: Look and feel of the oldest versions of Minetest-c55
title: Retro Plus
